sentences.sContent: Each team was responsible for making its own decisions and charting its own course.
sentences.sCn: 每个小组都是自己负责作出决定、制订计划。

words.tran: 图籍未载的；尚未绘入地图或海图的
宪章派；图解专家；宪章运动者

trans.tranCn: 绘制地图， 制订计划
trans.tranOther: to make a plan of what should be done to achieve a particular result
information that is clearly arranged in the form of a simple picture, set of figures,  graph  etc, or a piece of paper with this information on it
